beneficiosItems.title: Same Day in major cities
beneficiosItems.content: We offer same-day delivery service to your buyers.

beneficiosItems.title: National network of logistic operators
beneficiosItems.content: The largest logistic ecosystem in LatAm for nationwide shipping.

beneficiosItems.title: Platforms & marketplaces integrations
beneficiosItems.content: Connect your online sales channels easily and quickly..

beneficiosItems.title: Customizable logistics
beneficiosItems.content: Customize your rates and set rules for your shipments.

beneficiosItems.title: In-house logistics
beneficiosItems.content: For last-mile delivery we have our own distribution, with fast service and competitive rates.

beneficiosItems.title: Omnichannel platform
beneficiosItems.content: Comprehensive platform in order to provide multiple logistic solutions in one place.

0.title: Fullpack
0.content: We take care of your entire logistic chain: store, prepare, and ship. Your company offers more competitive rates without wasting time on management and packing.

1.title: Pickup
1.content: We pick up packages from your store or warehouse with the frequency of your choice. Over 15 logistic operators provide continuous tracking for you and your customer.

2.title: Drop-off
2.content: Take your packages to a post office and use the platform. Set rates and customize them without additional cost; you will only pay for the label. Nationwide shipping.

ecosistema.connectOnlineChannels: Connect your store and account on marketplaces to operate all logistics from one place. Fast and simple. We are partners with the main references in the e-commerce ecosystem in LatAm.

kpi.title: Industry specialists
kpi.content: As industry leaders, we provide all the information and technological tools that your business needs to scale to the next level.

testimonials.title:
How can we help you
boost your business?

first.title: Fravega
first.copy: Env√≠opack allowed us to boost our e-commerce, especially when we wanted to set up our marketplace, for which we had a very ambitious project. The technology is very solid, but moreover, the team is very professional and flexible, allowing us to meet all our expectations and needs.
first.name: Nombre apellido, CEO de Fr√°vega

second.title: BGH
second.copy: Our logistics were divided among multiple sales channels, suppliers, and technological solutions. We knew that to invest in online commerce, we had to start unifying tools and devising a logistics strategy that adapts to e-commerce needs. Env√≠opack provides us with the technology and options necessary for our business.
second.name: Nombre apellido, CEO de BGH

third.title: This is Feliz Navidad
third.copy: We are more flexible thanks to Env√≠opack. We needed a platform that would give us access to many distribution options with different logistics providers. The good thing is that with a single integration, we can now choose from more than 20 providers with just one click, allowing us to adapt quickly to the needs of our customers.
third.name: Nombre apellido, CEO de This is feliz navidad

fourth.title: Wallmart
fourth.copy: Our focus is on growing our E-commerce channel, and for that, we needed a technological tool that would allow us to grow and be more agile. It also facilitated decision-making, having real-time information. It is key to have partners like Env√≠opack to build a long-term growth strategy.
fourth.name: Nombre apellido, CEO de Wallmart
